segments.text: I see the water spilling all over the floor, and it’s just getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in it, but she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for cookies like he doesn’t have a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is just as guilty, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I’m just waiting for the crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window is open, and the outside looks so calm and perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman doesn’t just turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked neatly, but the water is ruining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware she is of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to get caught any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR
